column5: It looks like the Power of Stars

...If we hurry, we should be able to catch up!
And you seem to have been sticking
your head where it doesn't belong
But first, we will take back the

N-No... It's not just this mountain!
Ah, the Power of Stars stopped...!!
I'm going to kill you both.
was at least a little better.
I can't let myself lose either!
I will step aside for now.
If you want the Master Gear, it should
still be on the altar at the summit...
You can try to take it, if you wish.
It doesn't affect the plan in any way
if the Master Gear is taken or not.
Either way, I don't think it would
be possible for you to take it...
could get in a good workout.
